<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;failed to allocate memory buffer of &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine/#acaa1b3e2d07a6c9d2d7030c7dc7ec6a7">Twine::utohexstr</a>(FileSize) + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; bytes&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  writeHeaders();</Highlight></CodeLine>
